SEARCH
Package com.pdfjet

Class Chart

java.lang.Object
com.pdfjet.Chart
All Implemented Interfaces:
Drawable
public class Chart extends Object implements Drawable
Used to create XY chart objects and draw them on a page. Please see Example_09.

      Draws this chart on the specified page.
      Specified by:
      drawOn in interface Drawable
      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Exception - if the draw method did not succeed.
